title: B.C. should have enough beds and ventilators for COVID-19 patients: officials - The Globe and Mail
description: B.C. should have enough beds and ventilators for COVID-19 patients: officials The Globe and Mail B.C. health officials announce 67 new COVID-19 cases, 2 more deaths CTV News B.C. ‘cautiously optimistic’ about COVID-19 forecast, but warns hospitals could still…
content: 'The next two weeks, in particular, are our critical time,' British Columbia provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry, seen here on March 18, 2020, said at a briefing where the province released COVID-19 modelling that compared the growth of cases in B.C. w… [+5946 chars]
